text: Finally procurements being made. It took forever to increase the police personnel budget. No serious nation will prosper w/o adequate security. More reason we need to decentralised the police structure for better efficiency. #BeQuick! https://t.co/87OGfdQUTD

text:
Beautiful sermons everywhere. 
One thing must be clear. We need strong-willed reps(NASS/HOR) that will speak the minds of the people no matter who becomes president! Economic Restructuring for the South is a MUST!!
Lives have been sacrificed for gross incompetence across Nigeria

author: U. G.
text: Other than Peter Obi,  the rest of the aspirants are just Power grabbers, running from pillar to post. Wike using his previous antics of "we need a strong man to wrestle power". More reason he should put his skills in fighting for a Peter Obi candidature. He's gifted at that.
